explanations.reason: The paper focuses on assessing systemic risk in the Polish banking industry using financial indicators and the Conditional Value-at-Risk (CoVaR) approach, specifically through GARCH and quantile regression methods. There is no mention or application of machine learning techniques, neural networks, or any other AI-related methodologies in the title or abstract. The study is grounded in traditional financial risk assessment and econometric models rather than the listed keywords related to machine learning and AI.
